action.description: The type of UI adaptation to perform

target.description: The UI element or component to apply the adaptation to, 'all' is also an option, if targeting all elements

value.description: Numeric multiplier for size changes (e.g., 1.5 for 50% larger)

mode.description: Interaction mode or visual mode to switch to (e.g., 'voice', 'gesture', 'high' for contrast)

reason.description: Human-readable explanation of why this adaptation was suggested based on the user event and context

intent.description: The inferred user intent, what did you think the user's intent was based on the user input event?
